name: hemmelig
tagline: A self-hosted service for sharing encrypted secrets that expire automatically
description: Hemmelig is a self hosted secret sharing application for sending encrypted notes that expire after viewing or a set time. It is useful for delivering passwords or confidential messages without leaving data on third party services.

features.title: Secret Sharing
features.description: Share sensitive text using one-time access links

features.title: Automatic Expiration
features.description: Remove secrets after being viewed or expired

features.title: Password Protection
features.description: Protect shared secrets with an optional password

features.title: Web-Based Interface
features.description: Create and access secrets through a browser

features.title: Minimal Data Retention
features.description: Avoid long-term storage of shared content

features.title: Self-Hosted Deployment
features.description: Run the secret sharing service on your own servers
